title: Task 66

question.text: What do physical or behavioral traits include in biometrics?

answers.feedback: Random objects don't fit the idea of personal characteristics used in biometrics.
Magical powers are unrelated to the concept of unique personal features in biometrics.
Colorful patterns do not represent the specific traits of your body or behavior.

answers.answer: Special characteristics of your body or behavior

description: Physical or behavioral traits are special things about your body or how you act. It can be your face, fingerprints, or the way you move. Biometrics uses these things to keep things safe.
